metadata.name: Scythai_01
metadata.description:
I wanted to draw the cloth from far east style. basically as 'Scythai'.
I respect every history is connected. not only it has been mixed and changed but also it can be unique. 
Hope there is no borders in my 'Scythia'. The only hope there would be 'beauty' and 'person who likes beauty of the east'

Number - 01
'pink jar'
